Edgar Desainte-Maréville

PhD student at ENS Lyon

  • Home
  • Curriculum

I am a first-year PhD student at École Normale Supérieure de Lyon, under the supervision of Elisa Riccietti, Paulo Gonçalves, and Nelly Pustelnik. I am a member of the Inria Ockham team of the LIP laboratory.

Research interests

I am interested in inverse problems and multilevel optimization.
